text: Red One is a 2024 action Christmas movie starring Dwayne Johnson and Chris Evans. ==Plot== A hacker named Jack Oâ€™Malley is tricked into helping Gryla the Witch kidnap Santa Claus so Santa's bodyguard Callum gets Jack to help him rescue Santa with Krampus' help. title: Red One (movie)
